sourcesContent:
import cssImg from "./assets/experience/css.png"
import djangoImg from "./assets/experience/django.png"
import galogoImg from "./assets/experience/galogo.png"
import htmlImg from "./assets/experience/html.png"
import mongodbImg from "./assets/experience/mongodb.png"
import nodeImg from "./assets/experience/node.png"
import petronasImg from "./assets/experience/petronas.png"
import pythonImg from "./assets/experience/python.png"
import reactImg from "./assets/experience/react.png"
import javascriptImg from "./assets/experience/javascript.png"

export const getImageUrl = ( path ) => {
  return new URL(`assets/${path}`, import.meta.url).href;
};

export const getImg = (title) => {
  
  let selectedImg;

  switch(title) {
    case "HTML":
      selectedImg = htmlImg
      break
    case "CSS":
      selectedImg = cssImg
      break
    case "React":
      selectedImg = reactImg
      break
      case "JavaScript":
      selectedImg = javascriptImg
      break
    case "Node":
      selectedImg = nodeImg
      break
    case "Python":
      selectedImg = pythonImg
      break
    case "MongoDB":
      selectedImg = mongodbImg
      break
    case "Django":
      selectedImg = djangoImg
      break
    case "ga":
      selectedImg = galogoImg
      break
    case "pct":
      selectedImg = petronasImg
      break
    default:
      selectedImg = ""
  }

  return selectedImg
}

// export default getImageUrl;
